name: Pies Frescos Mobile
description:
Run, jump and dodge in an adventure that includes platforms and dangers, while you have fun collecting chips to increase your score.

Compete with friends to see who can go the furthest and collect the most chips!

Immerse yourself in this bangtastic adventure with your friends and -why not- with your family.

Are you ready? Let the freshness begin.
